adminStakeEthForStEth(uint256).notice: Stake ContractAddresses.GAME-held ETH into stETH via Lido.

adminSwapEthForStEth(address,uint256).notice: Swap owner ETH for ContractAddresses.GAME-held stETH (1:1 exchange).
